name: Bloodmoon Season
description:
Welcome to the hunt my friend! The bloodmoon is upon us, and you are the only unlucky hunter in town. Please get rid of all these unholy abominations! Can you survive until dawn? (No dawn guaranteed)

Bloodmoon Season is a first-person action game featuring a crossbow, a knife, a friendly shopkeeper...oh and hundreds of bloodthirsty werewolves! Tutorial is in the game, so have no fear! We got you covered. Let us know how long you could survive.

(Updated due to game-breaking bug)
